review: Awesome!!! more apps than i'll ever be interested in, but performance of this little jewel is unbeatable! With the added photos, prime music & other great new features, it's really incredible! The voice search is such a time saver too!!! just wish I could have that feature with youtube; maybe i'm missing something there....
author: The Pope

review: Neat and fast interface. The voice commands work great. Wouldn't bother to buy it without Prime membership. Would be great if the non-Prime content could be filtered off.
author: Alejandro Gaxiola

review: Customer service was very helpful and when the new remote did not work, they replaced the box..  Thanks for you help!!!!  We enjoy our Amazon Fire very much now!!
author: Kathleen G. Lewis "flowergirl"

review: Works great for watching Game of Thrones!
author: Bill White "William J White Jr"

review: Not a lot of app support but lots of great things for free.  I use it constantly.
author: Matthew Tormay

review: I might have had difficulty connecting to network had not my younger son been available to help. Thus far we like the service.
author: William Caldwell

review: Awesome device.  Great picture quality, super fast loading and a diverse set of content (music, movies, tv, games).  Coupled with Prime, this is a no brainier for anyone looking for great content alternatives to cable.  Definitely recommend.  I am an apple fan and have Apple TV but find this device even better.
author: G. Histed

review: There is more you can do with an Amazon Fire TV than Amazon has time to get their "minions" to write about.  I just keep their emails announcing anything new in a file for reference.  Keep an eye on Youtube videos for lots of howtos by those who are earning their Fire TV Ninja creds.  I'd love to "sideload" Kodi when I get the time.  I bought two of these so my wife can't complain that she got "left out " so she can watch whatever she wants when she wants.  They squooze a lot of bits down the pipe.
author: mr_fixit
